name: Woo Alltobill Payment Gateway
author: Alltobill

sections.description:
Website: www.alltobill.com

The Alltobill meta payment gateway is a simple method to integrate all payment providers and payment methods with one
single payment gateway. The WooCommerce Alltobill payment gateway helps you to accept credit card payments securely.

The Alltobill plugin extends WooCommerce allowing you to take payments directly on your store via Alltobill’s API.

With Alltobill you’re getting an optimal payment page which is also optimized for mobile devices, that supports all popular
payment methods especially in Europe that you can quickly and easily integrate into your WooCommerce-shop according to your design preferences.

Payment methods

  • Mastercard
  • VISA
  • AMEX
  • Masterpass
  • PayPal
  • Stripe
  • Apple Pay
  • Maestro
  • TWINT
  • Billpay
  • PostFinance Card
  • PostFinance E-Finance
  • myOne
  • V Pay
  • Giropay
  • Bitcoin
  • REKA
  • Swissbilling
  • Klarna
  • Rechnung (Invoice)
  • Swiss-QR Invoice
  • WIRpay

Supported payment service providers

  • Ogone / Ingenico
  • PostFinance
  • Concardis
  • VIVEUM
  • Coinbase
  • Paymill
  • Datatrans
  • SIX Saferpay
  • PayPal
  • Paymill
  • Stripe
  • Braintree
  • Swissbilling
  • Billpay
  • WIRpay
  • PayOne
  • Masterpass
sections.installation:
• Download the plugin
  • Install the plugin using the .zip archive
  • Activate the installed plugin in your WooCommerce Backend
  • Configure the plugin in your Alltobill Account
  • Enter the title which should be displayed during checkout, your instance name (e.g. example.alltobill.com => example) and the API secret which you can find in your Alltobill administration interface under Settings > API
  • Configure the webhook URL in Alltobill, use the URL to your shop and add /?wc-api=wc_alltobill_gateway
sections.changelog:
1.6

  • Added new payment method WIRpay

1.5

  • Minor bug fixed

1.4

  • Bug fixed – Cart will be empty only after a successful payment

1.3

  • Some minor bugfixes
  • New status handling

1.2

  • New extension – Now you are able to define a prefix

1.1

  • Bug fixed – Payment method icons not displayed due to wrong file path

1.0

  • First version of Alltobill plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  • Download the plugin
  • Install the plugin using the .zip archive
  • Activate the installed plugin in your WooCommerce Backend
  • Configure the plugin in your Alltobill Account
  • Enter the title which should be displayed during checkout, your instance name (e.g. example.alltobill.com => example) and the API secret which you can find in your Alltobill administration interface under Settings > API
  • Configure the webhook URL in Alltobill, use the URL to your shop and add /?wc-api=wc_alltobill_gateway
